titleStmt.title: The humble answer of the Divines attending the Honorable Commissioners of Parliament, at the treaty at Newport in the Isle of Wight. To the second paper delivered to them by his Majesty, Octob. 6. 1648. about episcopall government. Delivered to his Majesty, October 17. I appoint Abel Roper to print this copie, entituled The humble answer of the Divines, &c. Richard Vines,
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly

titleStmt.title: The humble answer of the Divines attending the Honorable Commissioners of Parliament, at the treaty at Newport in the Isle of Wight. To the second paper delivered to them by his Majesty, Octob. 6. 1648. about episcopall government. Delivered to his Majesty, October 17. I appoint Abel Roper to print this copie, entituled The humble answer of the Divines, &c. Richard Vines,
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Roper, at the signe of the Sunne over against S. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Stephen Marshall, who was one of the Newport divines.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 20th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
